column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " If you think holding us hostage will give you some leverage against the Avatar , you 're gon na be very disappointed . "
#Text=Ming - Hua says : " Ca n't we just enjoy our time together in silence ? "
#Text=Mako says : " And why did you need Korra alive back in Zaofu ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " So you guys were like locked up for fifteen years , huh ?
#Text=It must 've been like crazy boring .
#Text=" Ghazan says : " Actually , it was only thirteen years .
#Text=But it felt like thirty .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I mean , what did you do with all that time ?
#Text=Did you sing songs , work on crafts ?
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " Not a lot of craft supplies in a volcanic prison cell .
#Text=" Ghazan says : " And I must 've renamed the constellations about a thousand times .
#Text=When it rained , that was a big event .
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " I would 've killed for some rain .
#Text=Mostly I just made up stories about the guards : who was having trouble with his girlfriend ; which one secretly wished he 'd become a pastry chef .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ooh okay , that sounds like fun .
#Text=Let me try that on you guys .
#Text=You were raised by an older sister , your mustache grew in when you were ten and I 'm sensing - just sensing - an unspoken attraction between you two .
#Text=" Ghazan says : " Two out of three .
#Text=Not bad .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin , would you stop making friends with the bad guys ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Sorry !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Ghazan , gag those two .
#Text=We 're almost there .
#Text="
